DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability single dose ILV-095 healthy Japanese male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Single Doses ILV-095 Healthy Japanese Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Men age 20 45 year inclusive screening . Sexually active men must agree use medically acceptable form contraception study continue 12 week study drug administration . Body mass index ( BMI ) range 17.6 26.4 kg/m2 body weight great equal 45 kg . Healthy determine investigator basis screen evaluation . Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette per day determine history . Must able abstain smoking inpatient stay . Have high probability compliance completion study . Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study . Any subject orthopedic surgery within 12 week screen visit plan ( elective ) orthopedic surgery within 12 week study drug administration . Acute disease state ( eg , nausea , vomit , infection , fever , active infection , diarrhea ) within 7 day enrollment .
